name: Schmoovin
description:
This game is a 3d action platformer that is based on going fast and using a grappling hook. The current build is purely a movement prototype. I want to see what works and what doesn't from a movement perspective. I really appreciate all feedback! I am very active in my discord server and that is the best way to reach me directly. Thank you for your time and good luck on your runs!
Discord: https://discord.gg/a25TR3u

CONTROLS:

WS: move forward/back

AD: Strafe

Right Click: Grapple

Left Control: Crouch

Left Shift: Sprint

Sprint + Crouch = slide

F5 = restart level
